what_you_do: Harvey Deutschendorf is an Emotional Intelligence expert, internationally published author and speaker who has worked in the field of E. I. for more than 20 years.
social_proof: Recognized as one of the top 100 Thought Leaders by Trust Across America in 2015, author of a book endorsed by notable figures like Brian Tracy, Jim Clemmer, and John Gray.
signature_programs: The Other Kind of Smart book
business_focus: Helping businesses and individuals improve their emotional intelligence skills.
